column4: I tried to resize my NTFS partition and Windows XP was entirely destroyed. The partition is also unmountable. Is there any way to FORCE linux to mount it and get at my data? I don't give two shits if Windows is recoverable.
/dev/hda1       /mnt/winxp      ntfs    ro,auto,uid=1000,gid=1000 0 0 is the entry in /etc/fstab to mount a winxp partition
I've just been usig mount -t ntfs /dev/hda1 /mnt
